Title: Evocators on Celestial Dracolines
Legend: Dracolines are fearsome beasts of Azyr whose roars can unman even the staunchest foes. When their savagery is allied with the magical prowess of an Evocator, the result is a force to be reckoned with.
Intro: Each model in an Evocators on Celestial Dracolines unit is armed with a Tempest Blade and Stormstave. 2 in every 3 models can replace the unit’s weapon option with a Grandstave.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Cleansing Phalanx

Rules.Name: Empower
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit is a WIZARD while it has 2 or more models. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It only knows the Empower spell and cannot attempt to cast any other spells. Any number of EVOCATORS units can attempt to cast Empower in the same hero phase.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Celestial Dracolines are each armed with Monstrous Claws.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be an Evocator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Tempest Blade and Stormstave or Grandstave.

Rules.Name: Celestial Lightning Arc
Rules.Fluff: Evocators summon bands of celestial lightning that arc around their weapons.
Rules.Rule: After this unit has fought for the first time in a phase and all of its attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit. Roll 3 dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Rules.Name: Thunderous Pounce
Rules.Fluff: A Dracoline builds energy as it charges towards the foe; as it pounces, it discharges that force through its claws in a blast of Azyrite power.
Rules.Rule: You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit.

Rules.Name: Empower
Rules.Fluff: When gathered in enough numbers, Evocators can empower themselves or their comrades.
Rules.Rule: Empower is a spell that has a casting value of 6 and a range of 12". If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly REDEEMER or SACROSANCT unit wholly within range. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
